venue.name: Peter's Park - Joe Wex Dog Run

item.description:
First French Bulldog meetup this Spring!

Let's welcome the warm weather and get the kids out to play!

This is my first meetup as organizer so I'm going to switch things up a bit. I've heard from so many members already about venues etc (I'm trying to answer everybody)-THANKS!

I decided to forge ahead and plan the first meeting at our old favorite Peters Park in the South End. I know the gravel is not ideal but can be much better than mud.

A few changes:
Meeting dues is $4 per meetup payed via paypal on the site. This is to cover meetup fees, and other goodies.
My biggest issue with the Peters Park is trying to hold onto Simon's leash, my bag, and a cup of java and open the gates. SO, I will have with me a few boxes of Java from DD. Bring a mug or I'll have cups. Also, I'll have name tags for everybody so we can remember names. Additionally, every meetup will have goodie bags for the kids to take home.

I look forward to seeing everybody! Let's keep our fingers crossed for good weather
Terri & Simon
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a meetup name tag on and meetup name tags for all who rsvp YES. You won't be able to miss the group!
item.why: Who needs a reason? If you own a frenchie you JUST know...put 20 of them together and you can't stop laughing. It's great to discuss behavioral or health issues specific to the breed.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Let's revive this Frenchie meetup! First Spring meetup.
